backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two audio-related features referencing GlobalAudioProvider.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH theme tokens for light and dark modes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that wraps all pages in GlobalAudioProvider and switches pages using Zustand state.
frontend/src/audio/GlobalAudioProvider.t: Context provider managing a persistent looping HTMLAudioElement for cani.mp4 with play/pause/toggle.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsBa: SVG-based animated floating hearts and sparkles rendered as a fixed non-interactive background.
frontend/src/components/GlassPanel.tsx: Glass-style div wrapper component merging provided className and HTML div attributes.
frontend/src/components/GlobalAudioToggl: Fixed music toggle button using GlobalAudioProvider to start or stop global audio.
frontend/src/components/HeartConfetti.ts: Generates and animates 30 falling SVG heart confetti elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, component classes, and custom animations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for className merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Page1Welcome.tsx: Displays a welcome screen with an initial overlay, animations, and buttons to start music or proceed.
frontend/src/pages/Page2MeaningOfRoses.t: Shows a grid of rose cards that reveal messages when selected and includes a button to continue.
frontend/src/pages/Page3BouquetBuilder.t: Lets users add animated roses to build a bouquet, wrap it, and proceed to the next page.
frontend/src/pages/Page4AcceptMyFlower.t: Prompts the user to accept a flower, with a playful moving 'No' button and confetti on acceptance.
frontend/src/pages/Page5Music.tsx: Shows a music-themed message with an animated icon and a button to continue.
frontend/src/pages/Page6FinalMessage.tsx: Displays the final heartfelt message before the replay page with a button to proceed.
frontend/src/pages/Page7Replay.tsx: Shows a closing screen with a bouquet and a button to replay the experience.
frontend/src/state/micrositeFlowStore.ts: Manages microsite navigation and state (page, bouquet, acceptance) using Zustand.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, specifying content paths, extending theme with OKLCH-based color system, custom containers, and adding plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
